businessProfile.name: LaPorta's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 485 W Klein Rd, Williamsville, NY 14221, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 485 W Klein Rd, Williamsville, NY 14221, USA

reviews.text: Great pizza - always consistent! Owner, his family and staff are kind and helpful. LaPorta‚Äôs has been my go-to for a long time! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!
In town from Wv recommend trying the ‚ÄúWhite‚Äù Pizza, everything was great & People were very helpful and friendly as well.
I‚Äôve had there pizza twice now and it has always been good. Not the best pizza but certainly is one of the best I‚Äôve had in Buffalo.  Service was excellent. No obvious complaints. Overall, 8/10.

I have been going to this place for years and it‚Äôs still one of my favorite places to get a sub from! I stopped here tonight on my lunch break and I had to wait a little longer than normal for my sub because they were busy. But the owner talked with me the entire time and was very friendly and personable. My food turned out perfect as well. I‚Äôve never been let down by this place. I highly recommend stopping in and grabbing a bite to eat.
I have known Pat (LaPorta) and Scott for a very long time, and the pizzeria experience has always been exemplary.  Even after we moved to Vegas in 2015, we return every year and get a Greek pizza.

editorial_summary.overview: Long-running, booth-lined outfit with outdoor tables & a menu of classic pies, subs & wings.

recentReviews.text: Great pizza - always consistent! Owner, his family and staff are kind and helpful. LaPorta‚Äôs has been my go-to for a long time! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!
We have been ordering from LaPortas for over 30 yeara and has never disappointed!
LaPortas pizza and wings are absolutely the best.  We have tried many places for pizza and wings but LaPortas wins hands down !!  Best sauce, best crust, best cheese!
I have known Pat (LaPorta) and Scott for a very long time, and the pizzeria experience has always been exemplary.  Even after we moved to Vegas in 2015, we return every year and get a Greek pizza.

detailedReviews.author: scott
detailedReviews.text: Great service and great pizza/food!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony misita
detailedReviews.text: Greatest pizza in wny

detailedReviews.author: Betsy Gengo
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza - always consistent! Owner, his family and staff are kind and helpful. LaPorta‚Äôs has been my go-to for a long time! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!

detailedReviews.author: Satchel Lad
detailedReviews.text: Great staff and food

detailedReviews.author: Christine Horton
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Joelle Sberg
detailedReviews.text: We have been ordering from LaPortas for over 30 yeara and has never disappointed!

detailedReviews.author: Edward Domanski
detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere. Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Carolyn Wildman
detailedReviews.text: LaPortas pizza and wings are absolutely the best.  We have tried many places for pizza and wings but LaPortas wins hands down !!  Best sauce, best crust, best cheese!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Wearne
detailedReviews.text: Excellent!!! Every single time!

detailedReviews.author: Kathryn Mackmin
detailedReviews.text: I have known Pat (LaPorta) and Scott for a very long time, and the pizzeria experience has always been exemplary.  Even after we moved to Vegas in 2015, we return every year and get a Greek pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Bradlea Napier
detailedReviews.text: In town from Wv recommend trying the ‚ÄúWhite‚Äù Pizza, everything was great & People were very helpful and friendly as well.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Smith
detailedReviews.text: Team there is amazing. Food is top notch. I drive all the way from Grand Island for their calzones. Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Russell Staffeldt
detailedReviews.text: Best calzones in buffalo

detailedReviews.author: Jason Kale
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the Northtowns

detailedReviews.author: Lori McArtney-Topor
detailedReviews.text: First time here. My sons ordered a sub and I ordered a personal pan pizza. Everything was delicious. We will definitely be back !

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Skidmore
detailedReviews.text: We ordered the white pizza with onions, tomatoes, and mushrooms on half and pepperoni on other half of a deep dish pizza. Was delicious!!!! Highly recommended this pizzeria.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Fuller
detailedReviews.text: I especially love the white pizza & crispy crust

detailedReviews.author: Elliot
detailedReviews.text: Always a pleasure!

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Schultz
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Raffaele Longobardi
detailedReviews.text: visiting my sister in my hometown and she recommended LaPorta‚Äôs saying thier subs were always good. I ordered the wings which were pricey i thought, and said im only here for a visit, got eat some wings, got them to go. So i cant comment on service. the wings were obviously cooked in the oil used to fry fish. you could smell, then taste the fish fry. the wings were way overcooked and dry, and really didn‚Äôt taste very fresh. there was no sauce in them to speak of, even though i ordered them medium. my sister tried them as well and the taste made her recoil. ugh! i ate three wings and she ate one and we tossed them out. tasted that fish taste all night. bad wings in western new york? bad on them. won‚Äôt be back

detailedReviews.author: Frank Wild
detailedReviews.text: Amazing Pizzeria! Nice family owned little place great to grab a slice or a sit-down meal! Highly recommend! If in the area - must check out!

detailedReviews.author: Curtis Masich
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and well run. Not a lot of old school places like this around.

detailedReviews.author: Janet Pemberton
detailedReviews.text: I like their pizza!

detailedReviews.author: cresh yopants
detailedReviews.text: $20 for a lackluster pie is disappointing. I miss the days when the fellas and I could stop by on a hot summer afternoon, enjoy a few slices and cold drinks for just $5-$7, and appreciate a more relaxed atmosphere. Unfortunately, La Porta has embraced a pretentious aesthetic that reflects the broader shift in Northport Village, one that prioritizes style over substance.

detailedReviews.author: Austin Sierra
detailedReviews.text: We were passing thru  wanted to try a new pizza place saw laportas had good reviews we went in and got 2 slices service was amazing pizza was very good and fresh would definitely recommend amazing slices and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Lena Leeper
detailedReviews.text: A Good choice for a quick lunch on the go!

detailedReviews.author: C Oettle
detailedReviews.text: i moved out of WNY 16 years ago and i still talk about how good this place is and i live across the country now.

detailedReviews.author: Loraine Ingrasci
detailedReviews.text: One of the best pizzas in Buffalo

detailedReviews.author: Michael Bray
detailedReviews.text: I have been a patron of LaPorta's Pizzeria for over 30 years, since my childhood.  The people are amazing, the food is great, and I would recommend ordering Pizza, Wings, or Submarines from here to anyone at anytime.

detailedReviews.author: Madison Davis
detailedReviews.text:
My fianc√© and I decided to try LaPorta‚Äôs Pizza and ordered two large pizzas (a cheese and a margarita with pepperoni) and a ham sub. Since I couldn‚Äôt find the pizza sizes or prices online, I called to place the order. The man who answered told me they offered small and large sizes and mentioned they were busy, so I placed my order quickly.

When I went to pick up the food 40 minutes later, I was shocked to find the total came to $85. For two pizzas and a sub to-go, that price is pretty ridiculous. The man at the register admitted that the online prices are incorrect and said it‚Äôs been an ongoing issue, which made the situation even more frustrating.

The pizzas were good‚Äîflavorful and well-made‚Äîbut the ham sub was mediocre and definitely not worth the price. While the food was decent, the pricing felt unjustifiable for what we got.

If you‚Äôre planning to order from LaPorta‚Äôs, be prepared for sticker shock at checkout. The quality doesn‚Äôt quite justify the cost, especially for takeout.

detailedReviews.author: Johanne J
detailedReviews.text: Yesterday I as my first time because I was in a hurry. I usually go to other places since I was shopping at Dash‚Äôs I said why not. The owner was very unfriendly I said hello he didn‚Äôt even respond or try to help me. Not only they are very pricey the pineapple pizza taste like dirt absolutely no flavor. I should have to listen to my instincts. I will never go there again. Oh it gets better, the pizza was cold and wasn‚Äôt fresh at loll. Wanted my hard earned $35.

detailedReviews.author: K Crowell
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in for some slices of Za. The white pizza was premium. üëå some of the best pizza i have had in a while.

detailedReviews.author: A M
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm from Long island and my husbands from New Jersey came across this place today and decided to try it. The pizza is good!  probably the closest we can get to home! We have been dying to find a place like this! looks like it will be our go to!

detailedReviews.author: Peggy Pozzuto
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in for loaded pizza fries and my husband got a Greek slice. Great food. Nice, cozy restaurant!

detailedReviews.author: Morgan Johnson
detailedReviews.text: I have been going to this place for years and it‚Äôs still one of my favorite places to get a sub from! I stopped here tonight on my lunch break and I had to wait a little longer than normal for my sub because they were busy. But the owner talked with me the entire time and was very friendly and personable. My food turned out perfect as well. I‚Äôve never been let down by this place. I highly recommend stopping in and grabbing a bite to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Brad Evelt
detailedReviews.text: This place makes the best subs in williamsville, would recommend to anyone. They are reasonably priced, quick, and have great customer service!

detailedReviews.author: Dominick Walenczak
detailedReviews.text: Pat and company have an AMAZING pizza place that my family has been faithfully frequenting for DECADES! The pizza has a nice medium thickness to it that the perfect balance between New York and Chicago. The calzones are probably some of the best in Western NY. The dine-in experience is cozy and comfortable and the staff are all friendly and excellent. I can't say enough good things about this place!

detailedReviews.author: D A
detailedReviews.text: I highly recommend the Greek pizza. This place makes great pizza. dough is outstanding, pizza is very good and non greasy. I always stop in when I'm in the neighborhood.

detailedReviews.author: Joel Towart
detailedReviews.text: We got pizza (slices), subs, fries, and fried dough. The pizza was the perfect amount of sauce with a crispy undercarriage, absolutely loved it. The subs were really solid, nothing extraordinary, just a nice solid sub. Fried dough I would highly recommend for a sweet treat and the French fries were perfectly crispy. Overall a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Sheldon Huddleston
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve had there pizza twice now and it has always been good. Not the best pizza but certainly is one of the best I‚Äôve had in Buffalo.  Service was excellent. No obvious complaints. Overall, 8/10.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Gemmati
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and boneless wings were delicious and service was amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Michele Vaccarello
detailedReviews.text: I ordered for the first time today, and I‚Äôm extremely happy! The food was delicious! I will definitely order again!

detailedReviews.author: Madeleine Payne
detailedReviews.text: New to this area and this has been out go to pizza place!

detailedReviews.author: Cat Woman
detailedReviews.text: Consistently good food.  I usually get the pizza special with two slices and a drink.  Pizza is made with fresh dough and is thin and crispy with robust sauce.  They use good quality ingredients and the employees are always friendly. One of my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù places in this area.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Geoghan
detailedReviews.text: Really liked the pizza nice sauce good cheese really nice friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Jane E
detailedReviews.text: They have a better than average menu incl calzones and fries with toppings. The food is very good.

detailedReviews.author: Kim Yourston Jr.
detailedReviews.text: Good food,  good staff, never along wait for takeout.

detailedReviews.author: Tmhltr
detailedReviews.text: This pizzeria has a hidden, unfortunately high, percentage-based service fee to use a credit card.  I would not eat here again without cash.  There are better options for the price, with more transparent pricing.

detailedReviews.author: Matt
detailedReviews.text: Most disgusting wings I ever had,  pizza was like cardboard DISGUSTING ordered extra crispy

detailedReviews.author: Kurt M
detailedReviews.text: Always a great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jered Fitch
detailedReviews.text: Food was not to expectations.  Chicken wings were dry and the smallest  I have ever had.  Pizza dough was like cardboard.  I can't believe you would serve wings this small.  I will not be trying this place again.

detailedReviews.author: kiersten moore
detailedReviews.text: They got the order wrong and the chicken tenders were disappointing. They didn't take out the fatty parts so every single one had huge chunks of fat. Gross.

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Puccio
detailedReviews.text: Best deep dish white pizza!

detailedReviews.author: N M
detailedReviews.text: Ordered take out. Eggplant parmesan sub was delicious. Perfectly breaded eggplant. 1/2 and 1/2 pizza had a flavourful crust. Real italian. You won't be disappointed.They legit appreciate your business.

detailedReviews.author: Tina Ribakove
detailedReviews.text: Friendly neighborhood pizza shop. Friendly and reasonable. Our go-to place. Good wings too.

detailedReviews.author: Kristin Haines
detailedReviews.text: Food is good here. The gluten free pizza is very good and I will always go back. The staff is great too.  Go try them out

detailedReviews.author: raymond mosser
detailedReviews.text:
Food was absolutely  fantastic.  Fresh hand made dough a forgotten art
Ok

detailedReviews.author: Josh Pinard
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza!! The best part was the service level. Top notch all the way around!

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Geurra
detailedReviews.text:
didn‚Äôt end up ordering because I was met with rude customer service. I was also told they are unable to mix two wing sauces together‚Ä¶ was willing to pay more‚Ä¶ place doesn‚Äôt want business
(follow up to response) - the woman I spoke to over the phone Tuesday during the day told me otherwise

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Molina
detailedReviews.text:
Never heard of this place before but I thought I‚Äôd give it a try today since it was so close to my work.

I got a personal white pizza and a drink for delivery. 90% of places give you mostly dough/crust with a small pool of ingredients in the center when you order a personal pizza. This was not the case. Ingredients were plentiful and spread out. Crust was very tasty and the whole pizza was cooked evenly. I‚Äôm eager to try out what else they have. This will be my go-to from now on when I‚Äôm hungry at work.

detailedReviews.author: Victoria Kit
detailedReviews.text: Best chicken finger sub - been a customer since 2000. Each time I'm in town, I have to have it :)

detailedReviews.author: Sheldon Soman
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a few days before the super bowl and they had it ready on time.  Delicious pizza and no skimping on the toppings.  Awesome pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jane Conners
detailedReviews.text: Had an assortment of delicious dishes. All were great

detailedReviews.author: Ann Falcone
detailedReviews.text: This is our go to place - Delicious pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Debra Soman
detailedReviews.text: My friend and I met for lunch here.  Food was very good and service was great.  I really enjoyed it. The atmosphere was warm and inviting.

detailedReviews.author: ROBERT ROGAN
detailedReviews.text: Good food Good service Good people

detailedReviews.author: Project Nexus
detailedReviews.text: Many years ago, La Porta's was a family go to for our pizza. Time skip to the present and an opportunity to stop for a couple of slices to go. Simply delicious üòã!  The "pasta" is not too dense or too thick, and is firm enough to hold a slice with one hand and not have the ingredients slide off onto one's lap! Not too sweet and the ingredients,  themselves, fresh and tasty. Seriously, a memory reinforced with a new experience of great taste and quality,  evidently consistent of the family and proprietors of La Porta's.  I only wish I lived closer to enjoy the flavor and experience more often.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Mednick
detailedReviews.text: Consistent and delicious every time with a friendly staff!

detailedReviews.author: Ray Broeker
detailedReviews.text: It pains me to write this review. We (my spouse & I) have been loyal to LaPorta's (in Dash's plaza) for more than a few years. We both agree that the product was consistently inconsistent. We called for 'take out', entirely. The blonde stocky delivery man can verify how many times (and how we tipped) he came here. Once I even joked with the Owner (he said no soup until the then Gov. allowed people back to in-store seating) and I laughed. But I still called week after week. They know HOW many times. I was the "guy who" supported them during the pandemic. So, last Saturday I called to place an order: I told the young lady my order and I asked can you not charge me for the "extra" sauce. My spouse likes extra sauce and EVERY time I pay the extra amount of $3.50. I simply asked if I could not be charged, this one time only. She said she would check with the manager, he said NO. I said to cancel my order. I called back & spoke to the owner (or tried to). He said do you want me to lose money? I said "this is your idea of a LOYALTY program? Kiss my grits! We were disconnected but he knows my number here. He never called back so I must vote with my feet and say sianara to this establishment.

detailedReviews.author: Debbie Kociencki
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Liam Killeen
detailedReviews.text: I'm embarrassed to say that it took me a while to find out about LaPorta's, but once I did? Wow. I can only speak for the pizza, as that's what I always get when I'm here - but this is next-level good stuff. Perfect crust, and really generous with the toppings. Believe the hype.

detailedReviews.author: I D
detailedReviews.text: Lovely staff and delicious Pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Amy Cieslik
detailedReviews.text: Great gluten-free pizza!! Highly recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: Shirley G
detailedReviews.text: They have been in business for a long while and the food has stayed consistently amazing. This place brings back many childhood memories and I love being able to continue those with my children. Their pizza is amazing and the staff are so sweet. They have a wide array of options, I reccomend the calzones, wings, and one of the many style pizzas they offer!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the exceptional quality and taste of LaPorta's pizza, highlighting the best sauce, crust, and cheese. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and helpful staff, including the owner and his family, are frequently mentioned as a key part of the positive dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
LaPorta's has a loyal customer base, with patrons returning for decades and even traveling long distances for their favorite dishes. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent pricing information and sticker shock at checkout - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Negative reviews about food quality and customer service - review management can address this concern
Lack of ambiance and experience awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
